title: New: Freakish Atlantic – House Of Cards
content:
It’s been a few months since we last heard from Berlin duo Freakish Atlantic, a period in which it appears they’ve taken a step back to carefully consider their musical future, alongside writing material for their debut LP.

This new track, House Of Cards, released earlier today is a delightfully Scandinavian affair, filled with wistful synths and dreamy vocals building to a shimmering crescendo, coming in somewhere between Bon Iver and The Postal Service. Judging by the strength of this new track, combined with their excellent debut EP, Freakish Atlantic could well be the sound of the summer.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
